titulo: 30-Day Mastery: 101 Essential Spanish Verbs (Spanish Edition): Master 101 Fluency-Boosting Spanish Verbs in 30 Days (30-Day Mastery)
descripcion:
For High-Beginner to Low-Intermediate Learners
Master 101 essential Spanish verbs in the next 30 days, with this innovative, story-based immersion method. Just listen to one chapter per day, complete the exercises, and watch as you start saying exactly what you wanted to say! 
“I love Olly’s work - and you will too!” (Barbara Oakley, PhD, author of New York Times best seller, A Mind for Numbers)
Verbs are powerful tools to unlock your Spanish fluency, because they allow you to express yourself confidently in almost any situation. The problem? There are so many to remember and dozens of forms for each one. How on earth can you remember them all? Native speakers don’t learn Spanish verbs with memory tricks, and neither should you. This book helps you master 101 essential Spanish verbs - in all tenses - naturally, even if you’ve tried and failed in the past.
With 30-Day Mastery: 101 Essential Spanish Verbs, you'll learn through example and context, just like native speakers do! The magic of learning through story is that your main focus is actually not on memorising anything...you concentrate on understanding and enjoying the story! As you're reading the story, you will find that all of the new verbs in the text will begin to lodge themselves subconsciously in your brain. It doesn't happen right away - in fact it may take a couple of weeks for you to feel the real effects. But by the end of this book, you'll have a native-like command of 101 essential Spanish verbs that will amaze you and your friends!
In this story, you will follow Anne Philips, an American woman living in Barcelona as she tries to solve the mystery of La Luna Roja, a painting by an emerging Spanish artist.
When her friend Pol is accused of being the thief, Anne must do everything in her power to find the real culprit and save her friend from jail.
